channel.title: Posts on Harish Guda
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Harish Guda

item.title: Some Information on Creating Websites with R
item.description: I have always wanted to build attractive websites and still have a lot of control on the various facets of the website. I had previously owned a Google Site, which I never liked. I am not a professional with regards to web-development. Besides, my needs were minimal. With little knowledge on this topic, I did what everyone else does – dive straight into it. I am quite comfortable with R, and when Yihui Xie and co-authors came out with the book on blogdown, I decided to try it.

item.title: Om Vighnaraja
item.description: Hello all! This is my first post on my new website/blog, thus the title Om Vighnaraja (instead of a Hello World). My hope is to keep y’all updated with content regularly. Thank you.
